Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: nissandeh dar rakhanevaale chhaanvon aur sroton mein hai
aur un phalon ke beech jo ve chaahe
khao-piyo maze se, us karmon ke badale mein jo tum karate rahe ho.
nishchay hee uttamakaaron ko ham aisa hee badala dete hai
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalon kee
kha lo aur maze kar lo thoda-sa, vaastav mein tum aparaadhee ho
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalon kee
jab unase kaha jaata hai ki "jhuko! to nahin jhukate.
tabaahee hai us din jhuthalaanevaalon kee
ab aakhir isake pashchaat kis vaanee par ve eemaan laenge
